Dewboy, your "oh so large" mouth consider what it says, BEFORE it 
say anything. The council has to come to decisions (ie taking sides 
in some case) about things, if we didn't the RPG wouldn't move, and 
it would turn into an all out brawl.

To say that Hottie is correct would go against what we've been doing 
since becoming council members. LN did have a char named Devil 
Gigatron, so Hottie cannot have a character called that. Plain and 
simple. (if LN were to let Hottie use the name, then it's different)
